rows.label: tlk42300081_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo-mo!
It's rare to meet someone who isn't a
Luxurian here, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300081_01_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Psst...
Want to buy a board game, mo?

rows.label: tlk42300081_01_msg0003
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Shh! You're being too loud, mo!
Selling board games here isn't
allowed, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300081_01_msg0004
rows.name:
There's not much entertainment in Luxuria,
so I'm sure it would sell... but the shops
won't even notice me... mo.
